original_title: Highlander 2: To Be or Not to Be a Sequel
overview: This "Making of" featurette was included on the DVD Release of "Highlander II: The Quickening" The Renegade Version, which was director Russell Mulcahy's revision to the story arc AND a re-cut of the entire second Highlander movie that removed the dumbing-down of the plot that was demanded by the studio at the time of release.
tagline: The backstory of how the Renegade version of the sequel to Highlander came to be.
title: Highlander 2: To Be or Not to Be a Sequel
